scripts.start: rimraf .build && nodemon --ext js,graphql,json --watch ./src --exec 'npm --prefix ../catalogue-search run build & npm --prefix ../logger run build && prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && NODE_ENV=development babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir .build && copyfiles -u 2 "src/graphql/schema.graphql" .build/graphql/ && copyfiles .env .build/ && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node .build'
scripts.start:prod: rimraf .build && NODE_ENV=production babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir .build && copyfiles -u 2 "src/graphql/schema.graphql" .build/graphql/ && copyfiles .env .build/ && NODE_ENV=production TZ=utc node .build
